thread.section_title: St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: another London experience
thread.title_full: another London experience - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Oliver F
title: another London experience
text:
location is close to Buckingham palace and St James Court. hotel is clean and rooms are nice. hotel has a decent gym and all required amenities. breakfast was included in price and is sufficient. staff is very friendly and trying to help wherever possible.
would definitely come back and one of the better hotel experiences in London.
